invokermod:QuasOrb.NAME: Quas Orb
invokermod:QuasOrb.FLAVOR: A mystical orb containing the essence of ice.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Talent Point. Your Quas talents are #b25% more effective.

invokermod:WexOrb.NAME: Wex Orb
invokermod:WexOrb.FLAVOR: A mystical orb containing the essence of storm.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Talent Point. Your Wex talents are #b25% more effective.

invokermod:ExortOrb.NAME: Exort Orb
invokermod:ExortOrb.FLAVOR: A mystical orb containing the essence of fire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Talent Point. Your Exort talents are #b25% more effective.

invokermod:ArcaneSupremacy.NAME: Arcane Supremacy
invokermod:ArcaneSupremacy.FLAVOR: The ultimate manifestation of magical prowess.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Talent Point. Increase the maximum level of all talents by #b1. Your Invoke talents are #b25% more effective.
